pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Pseudo-Random Number Generation // Pseudo-random number generation for 11 multivariate distributions: Normal, t, Uniform, Bernoulli, Hypergeometric, Beta (Dirichlet), Multinomial, Dirichlet-Multinomial, Laplace, Wishart, and Inverted Wishart. The details of the method are explained in Demirtas (2004) DOI:10.22237/jmasm/1099268340.
